entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
